articles.title: Recreational drug use may worsen outcomes for cardiac intensive care patients - News-Medical.Net
articles.description: Recreational drug use may be a factor in a significant proportion of admissions to cardiac intensive care, with various substances detected in 1 in 10 such patients, suggest the findings of a multicentre French study published online in the journal Heart.

articles.title: It's 2023 and period products are only now being tested with blood - SBS News
articles.description: Women's health advocates say it has been a surprise that it has taken so long to properly test menstrual health products, and point out there are huge implications from inaccurate product testing.
